org.pepstock.charba.client.events

Class AbstractHandlerEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.events.Event
      • org.pepstock.charba.client.events.AbstractHandlerEvent
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AddHandlerEvent, RemoveHandlerEvent

    abstract class AbstractHandlerEvent
extends Event
    Abstract event which is fired when event handler has been added or removed to/from the chart.
    This event should use only for use internal only to manage internally all handlers.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero

      Returns true if the type of event handler is inside the list provided as argument, otherwise false.

        public final boolean isRecognize(List<EventType> types)
        Returns true if the type of event handler is inside the list provided as argument, otherwise false.

      • isRecognize

        public final boolean isRecognize(EventType type)
        Returns true if the type of event handler is equals to the event handler type provided as argument, otherwise false.
        Parameters:
        type - the event handler type to use checking if equals to the type of event handler of event
        Returns:
        true if the type of event handler is equals to the event handler type provided as argument, otherwise false
